fichiers.name: chercher_contenu
fichiers.action: Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-String -Pattern '{texte}' -List | Select Path, LineNumber | Select -First 20 | Out-String

fichiers.name: derniers_fichiers
fichiers.action: Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort LastWriteTime -Descending | Select -First 15 Name, LastWriteTime, @{N='Size(KB)';E={[math]::Round($_.Length/1KB,1)}} | Out-String

fichiers.name: doublons_fichiers
fichiers.action: Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Group-Object Length | Where Count -gt 1 | ForEach-Object { $_.Group | Select Name, Length, DirectoryName } | Select -First 20 | Out-String

fichiers.name: gros_fichiers
fichiers.action: Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort Length -Descending | Select -First 20 Name, @{N='Size(MB)';E={[math]::Round($_.Length/1MB,1)}}, DirectoryName | Out-String

fichiers.name: fichiers_type
fichiers.action: $f = Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter '*.{ext}' -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; "$($f.Count) fichiers .{ext} trouves"; $f | Select -First 15 Name, @{N='Size(KB)';E={[math]::Round($_.Length/1KB,1)}} | Out-String

fichiers.name: dossiers_vides
fichiers.action: Get-ChildItem -Directory -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where { (Get-ChildItem $_.FullName -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Count -eq 0 } | Select FullName | Out-String

fenetre.name: fenetre_haut_gauche
fenetre.action: Add-Type -TypeDefinition 'using System; using System.Runtime.InteropServices; public class K { [DllImport("user32.dll")] public static extern void keybd_event(byte vk, byte scan, int flags, int extra); }'; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x25,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x25,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x26,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x26,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0)

fenetre.name: fenetre_haut_droite
fenetre.action: Add-Type -TypeDefinition 'using System; using System.Runtime.InteropServices; public class K { [DllImport("user32.dll")] public static extern void keybd_event(byte vk, byte scan, int flags, int extra); }'; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x27,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x27,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x26,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x26,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0)

fenetre.name: fenetre_bas_gauche
fenetre.action: Add-Type -TypeDefinition 'using System; using System.Runtime.InteropServices; public class K { [DllImport("user32.dll")] public static extern void keybd_event(byte vk, byte scan, int flags, int extra); }'; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x25,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x25,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x28,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x28,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0)

fenetre.name: fenetre_bas_droite
fenetre.action: Add-Type -TypeDefinition 'using System; using System.Runtime.InteropServices; public class K { [DllImport("user32.dll")] public static extern void keybd_event(byte vk, byte scan, int flags, int extra); }'; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x27,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x27,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x28,0,0,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x28,0,2,0); [K]::keybd_event(0x5B,0,2,0)

systeme.name: bluetooth_on
systeme.action: Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Runtime.WindowsRuntime; $radio = [Windows.Devices.Radios.Radio,Windows.System.Devices,ContentType=WindowsRuntime]::GetRadiosAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Where-Object { $_.Kind -eq 'Bluetooth' }; if($radio) { $radio[0].SetStateAsync('On').GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Out-Null; 'Bluetooth active' } else { 'Aucun adaptateur Bluetooth' }

systeme.name: bluetooth_off
systeme.action: Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Runtime.WindowsRuntime; $radio = [Windows.Devices.Radios.Radio,Windows.System.Devices,ContentType=WindowsRuntime]::GetRadiosAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Where-Object { $_.Kind -eq 'Bluetooth' }; if($radio) { $radio[0].SetStateAsync('Off').GetAwaiter().GetResult() | Out-Null; 'Bluetooth desactive' } else { 'Aucun adaptateur Bluetooth' }

systeme.name: micro_mute
systeme.action: Add-Type -TypeDefinition 'using System;using System.Runtime.InteropServices;public class A{[DllImport("user32.dll")]public static extern void keybd_event(byte k,byte s,int f,int e);}'; [A]::keybd_event(0xAD,0,0,0); [A]::keybd_event(0xAD,0,2,0)

systeme.name: micro_unmute
systeme.action: Add-Type -TypeDefinition 'using System;using System.Runtime.InteropServices;public class A{[DllImport("user32.dll")]public static extern void keybd_event(byte k,byte s,int f,int e);}'; [A]::keybd_event(0xAD,0,0,0); [A]::keybd_event(0xAD,0,2,0)

systeme.name: vider_temp
systeme.action: $before = (Get-ChildItem $env:TEMP -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Measure-Object Length -Sum).Sum / 1MB; Remove-Item $env:TEMP\* -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $after = (Get-ChildItem $env:TEMP -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Measure-Object Length -Sum).Sum / 1MB; "Temp nettoye: $([math]::Round($before - $after, 1)) MB liberes"

systeme.name: temperature_cpu
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance MSAcpi_ThermalZoneTemperature -Namespace root/WMI -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { $t = ($_.CurrentTemperature - 2732) / 10; "CPU: $([math]::Round($t,1)) C" }

systeme.name: liste_utilisateurs
systeme.action: Get-LocalUser | Select Name, Enabled, LastLogon | Out-String

systeme.name: adresse_mac
systeme.action: Get-NetAdapter | Select Name, MacAddress, Status | Out-String

systeme.name: vitesse_reseau
systeme.action: Get-NetAdapter | Where Status -eq 'Up' | Select Name, LinkSpeed | Out-String

systeme.name: clipboard_compter
triggers: combien de caracteres dans le presse-papier

systeme.name: recherche_everywhere
systeme.action: Get-ChildItem -Path C:\ -Recurse -Filter '*{terme}*' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select -First 20 FullName | Out-String

systeme.name: tache_planifier
systeme.action: Write-Output 'Pour creer une tache planifiee, precisez: nom, heure, commande'

systeme.name: ram_usage
systeme.action: $os = Get-CimInstance Win32_OperatingSystem; $total = [math]::Round($os.TotalVisibleMemorySize/1MB,1); $free = [math]::Round($os.FreePhysicalMemory/1MB,1); $used = $total - $free; "RAM: $used/$total GB utilise ($free GB libre)"

systeme.name: cpu_info
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance Win32_Processor | Select Name, NumberOfCores, NumberOfLogicalProcessors, MaxClockSpeed | Out-String

systeme.name: ram_info
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance Win32_PhysicalMemory | Select Manufacturer, Capacity, Speed, MemoryType | Out-String

systeme.name: batterie_niveau
systeme.action: $b = Get-CimInstance Win32_Battery; if ($b) { "Batterie: $($b.EstimatedChargeRemaining)% - $($b.BatteryStatus)" } else { 'Pas de batterie detectee (PC fixe)' }

systeme.name: disque_sante
systeme.action: Get-PhysicalDisk | Select FriendlyName, MediaType, HealthStatus, Size | Out-String

systeme.name: carte_mere
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance Win32_BaseBoard | Select Manufacturer, Product, SerialNumber | Out-String

systeme.name: bios_info
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance Win32_BIOS | Select Manufacturer, SMBIOSBIOSVersion, ReleaseDate | Out-String

systeme.name: top_ram
systeme.action: Get-Process | Sort WorkingSet64 -Descending | Select -First 10 Name, @{N='RAM(MB)';E={[math]::Round($_.WorkingSet64/1MB,0)}} | Out-String

systeme.name: top_cpu
systeme.action: Get-Process | Sort CPU -Descending | Select -First 10 Name, @{N='CPU(s)';E={[math]::Round($_.CPU,1)}} | Out-String

systeme.name: carte_graphique
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance Win32_VideoController | Select Name, DriverVersion, AdapterRAM, VideoProcessor | Out-String

systeme.name: ports_ouverts
systeme.action: Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen | Select LocalPort, OwningProcess, @{N='Process';E={(Get-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Name}} | Sort LocalPort | Out-String

systeme.name: partage_reseau
systeme.action: Get-SmbShare | Select Name, Path, Description | Out-String

systeme.name: connexions_actives
systeme.action: Get-NetTCPConnection -State Established | Select RemoteAddress, RemotePort, OwningProcess, @{N='Process';E={(Get-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Name}} | Sort RemoteAddress | Out-String

systeme.name: vitesse_reseau
systeme.action: Get-NetAdapter | Where Status -eq Up | Select Name, LinkSpeed, MacAddress | Out-String

systeme.name: arp_table
systeme.action: Get-NetNeighbor | Where State -ne Unreachable | Select IPAddress, LinkLayerAddress, State | Out-String

systeme.name: test_port
systeme.action: Test-NetConnection -ComputerName '{host}' -Port {port} | Select ComputerName, TcpTestSucceeded, RemotePort | Out-String

systeme.name: route_table
systeme.action: Get-NetRoute | Where DestinationPrefix -ne '::' | Select DestinationPrefix, NextHop, InterfaceAlias | Out-String

systeme.name: nslookup
systeme.action: Resolve-DnsName '{domaine}' | Select Name, Type, IPAddress | Out-String

systeme.name: verifier_sante_disque
systeme.action: Get-PhysicalDisk | Select FriendlyName, MediaType, HealthStatus, Size, @{N='Size(GB)';E={[math]::Round($_.Size/1GB)}} | Out-String

systeme.name: historique_mises_a_jour
systeme.action: Get-HotFix | Sort InstalledOn -Descending | Select -First 10 HotFixID, Description, InstalledOn | Out-String

systeme.name: taches_planifiees
systeme.action: Get-ScheduledTask | Where State -eq 'Ready' | Select -First 15 TaskName, State | Out-String

systeme.name: demarrage_apps
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance Win32_StartupCommand | Select Name, Command, Location | Out-String

systeme.name: liste_imprimantes
systeme.action: Get-Printer | Select Name, DriverName, PortName, PrinterStatus | Out-String

systeme.name: batterie_rapport
systeme.action: powercfg /batteryreport /output $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\battery_report.html; Start-Process $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\battery_report.html; 'Rapport genere sur le Bureau'

systeme.name: detecter_ecrans
systeme.action: Get-CimInstance -Namespace root\wmi -ClassName WmiMonitorBasicDisplayParams | Select InstanceName, Active | Out-String

systeme.name: processus_details
systeme.action: Get-Process '{nom}' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select Name, CPU, @{N='RAM(MB)';E={[math]::Round($_.WorkingSet64/1MB,1)}}, StartTime | Out-String

systeme.name: diagnostic_reseau
systeme.action: $ping = Test-Connection 8.8.8.8 -Count 2 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $dns = Resolve-DnsName google.com -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if($ping){'Ping: OK'}else{'Ping: ECHEC'}; if($dns){'DNS: OK'}else{'DNS: ECHEC'}

systeme.name: wifi_mot_de_passe
systeme.action: $p = (netsh wlan show profile name=(netsh wlan show interfaces | Select-String 'Profil' | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split ':')[1].Trim() }) key=clear | Select-String 'Contenu de la cl' | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split ':')[1].Trim() }); if($p){"WiFi Password: $p"}else{'Non disponible'}

systeme.name: reset_reseau
systeme.action: netsh winsock reset; netsh int ip reset

systeme.name: capture_retardee
systeme.action: Start-Process snippingtool /clip; Start-Sleep 1; Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Windows.Forms; [System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys]::SendWait('%{d}'); 'Capture retardee lancee'

systeme.name: lister_usb
systeme.action: Get-PnpDevice -PresentOnly | Where-Object { $_.InstanceId -like 'USB*' } | Select FriendlyName, Status | Out-String

systeme.name: ejecter_usb
systeme.action: $vol = (Get-Volume | Where-Object { $_.DriveType -eq 'Removable' } | Select -First 1); if($vol){ $dl = $vol.DriveLetter; (New-Object -ComObject Shell.Application).Namespace(17).ParseName("${dl}:").InvokeVerb('Eject'); "USB ${dl}: ejecte" } else { 'Aucun USB amovible detecte' }

systeme.name: peripheriques_connectes
systeme.action: Get-PnpDevice -PresentOnly -Status OK | Select -First 25 Class, FriendlyName | Sort Class | Out-String

systeme.name: lister_adaptateurs
systeme.action: Get-NetAdapter | Select Name, InterfaceDescription, Status, LinkSpeed | Out-String

systeme.name: firewall_status
systeme.action: Get-NetFirewallProfile | Select Name, Enabled, DefaultInboundAction, DefaultOutboundAction | Out-String

systeme.name: firewall_regles
systeme.action: Get-NetFirewallRule -Enabled True -Direction Inbound | Select -First 20 DisplayName, Action | Out-String

systeme.name: firewall_reset
systeme.action: netsh advfirewall reset; 'Pare-feu reinitialise aux parametres par defaut'

systeme.name: langues_installees
systeme.action: Get-WinUserLanguageList | Select LanguageTag, InputMethodTips, Spellchecking | Out-String

systeme.name: synchroniser_heure
systeme.action: w32tm /resync /force; 'Heure synchronisee avec le serveur NTP'

systeme.name: activation_windows
systeme.action: $l = (Get-CimInstance SoftwareLicensingProduct -Filter "Name like 'Windows%'" | Where PartialProductKey).LicenseStatus; if($l -eq 1){'Windows est ACTIVE'}else{'Windows NON active'}

dev.name: docker_stop_all
dev.action: docker stop $(docker ps -q) 2>$null; 'Tous les conteneurs arretes'

dev.name: git_pull
dev.action: cd F:\BUREAU\turbo; git pull origin main

dev.name: git_push
dev.action: cd F:\BUREAU\turbo; git push origin main

dev.name: lm_studio_restart
dev.action: Stop-Process -Name 'LM Studio' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep 2; Start-Process lmstudio; 'LM Studio relance'

jarvis.name: historique_commandes
jarvis.action: if (Test-Path 'F:\BUREAU\turbo\data\action_history.json') { Get-Content 'F:\BUREAU\turbo\data\action_history.json' | ConvertFrom-Json | Select -Last 10 | Out-String } else { 'Aucun historique' }
